lines.text: He reached in and put a string of lights around my heart.
I wouldn't know what to do.
You can start by putting the 'Do Not Disturb' sign on the door.

[to Cay regarding her number of female visitors]
How you get all that traffic with no equipment is beyond me!

[while kissing Cay]
I don't usually feel this way at 11 o'clock in the morning.
Take your hands out of your pockets and come here.
[last lines]
Come with me. Ride with me to the next station.
What are we gonna get settled in 40 minutes?
I'll talk fast.
Send me a postcard when you get there. What is it you want?
Another 40 minutes with you.

[to Vivian]
Roll it all the way down
I won't take off my robe.
Well, we all have to draw the line somewhere.
I want you to open the door.
And I want you to leave me alone.
I can't! Honest.

[after Vivian breaks away from a passionate kiss]
We don't have to stop.
I do.
Where did you learn to kiss like that?
I don't know where that came from. It's back where it belongs, and I don't want to talk about it anymore. Take me back.

[tries to look through the rain on the windshield]
I can't see a thing!
I'll take my chances. Just drive.
Vivian, we have to get out of here, you know. Stand up. Take a walk. Have a Coke. Window shop?
Come on. I'm used to this.
Well, I'm not!
Listen, you're just visiting the way I live. I guess it would suit you find to hide in that hotel room until your train leaves.
Oh, then let's hire a float. You are so insistent on making everyone think the way you do!
Oh, yeah. You're making real headway in that department!
No fear, no confusion, so self-assured.
I don't act that way to change the world. I act that way so that the goddamn world won't change me!
Can I be honest with you, Frances?
It's a dyin' art, so be my guest.

[of her marriage]
It drowned in still waters.

[to Cay]
I've never felt this way before.
Can't you find something better to do?
Not since you came onto the scene!
Button yourself up. The professor doesn't want to see your business popping through. Where are your pants?
My only clear memory is arriving. The rest is a blur. An absolute blur.
I'm in a "can't keep my hands off him" phase.
Did you invite me over to, ah, watch the show?
[to Vivian while playing two slot machines]
You don't play, you can't win.
Long time no see, Miz Parker.

[disdainfully]
I'm handlin' it.
